comments.author: Dave
comments.body: _preparatore, shmeparatore_, what I'm looking for is a good cut man, someone in my corner who can help w/ the cleanup between rounds. A Burgess Meredith type who'll jog along behind me with a bucket of icewater and a hundred yards of gauze. I'm just glad I'm not a hemophiliac... Actually, maybe I am... Great ride guys! D

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: No, I never attended sport enhancing med school. I do have a friend working at Amgen who specializes in EPO. Watch for my results in this summer's Muddy Buddy... Dennis
